Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • qwirkle.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    a board saved as a grid
    Author:
    Niek Tijink & Thomas Kolner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      instantiates a new board with 150 * 150 fields

        yValue - yvalue of the field

      • testMove

        public int testMove(int[][] move,
           Tile[] hand)
        constructs a new TestMove, tests the move and returns the score
        Parameters:
        move - the move of the player
        hand - the hand of the player
        Returns:

      • getBoundaries

        public int[] getBoundaries(java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> c)
        gets the boundaries of the current board
        Parameters:
        c - the list with coordinates where a move is possible (see ComputerPlayer)
        Returns:
        the boundaries (0 = north, 1 = east, 2 = south, 3 = west)
